excerpt: "Hong Kong, Feb. 09, 2024 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Angelo Dilibero, the CEO of Clever Robot Group, predicts that 2024 will be a monumental year for artificial intelligence and Cryptocurrency, and CleverRobot is well placed to build on these changes. According to Dilibero, A.I will change our lives forever."
